alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:30AM CDT until May 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 1230 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 21 miles north of Whitman, or 27 miles northwest of Mullen, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Marsh Flat, Speckel Meir Lake, Round Lake, Hire, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek and Sevenmile Hill. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 71 and 100. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
